title: Tasty Rolled Omelets
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Wow, Yoshiko-chan, your bento looks delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukkukku...... This was an easy task for Fallen Angel Yohane...! Don’t mind if I- AHH~!! YOHANE’S ROLLED OMELET~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That bird took it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Uuu, I even woke up early to make it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yoshiko-chan, do you want to have some of mine? Come on, open wide.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s Yohane, not Yoshiko~! But sure, thanks. Nom... Munch munch... Whoa! What is this!? This is so delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Really? Yay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hey Ayumu, how did you make this rolled omelet? When I make a rolled omelet, it turns spicy and doesn’t taste as good......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It turns spicy...? Yohane-chan, do you want to make some together next time?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Really!? Please tell... Wait, no! The Fallen Angel Yohane grants you permission to teach her!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
